mutants.code: def extract_bold_text(html_code): bold_texts = [] start_tag = '' end_tag = '' start_index = 0 while True: start = html_code.find(start_tag, start_index) end = html_code.find(end_tag, start_index) if start == -1 or end == -1: break start_index = end + len(end_tag) bold_text = html_code[start + len(start_tag):end] bold_texts.append(bold_text) return bold_texts

def extract_bold_text(html_code):
    bold_texts = []
    start_tag = '<b>'
    end_tag = ''
    start_index = 0
    while True:
        start = html_code.find(start_tag, start_index)
        end = html_code.find(end_tag, start_index)
        if start == -1 or end == -1:
            break
        start_index = end + len(end_tag)
        bold_text = html_code[start + len(start_tag):end]
        bold_texts.append(bold_text)
    return bold_texts
